scripts.start: npm run build && rm -f dist/{js,css}/*.min.* && node server.js
scripts.dev: npm run build && (npm run watch & nodemon -r dotenv/config server.js -w server.js)
scripts.build:assets: mkdir -p dist && rm -rf dist/{fonts,img}/* dist/*.ico && cp -r assets/{fonts,img,*.ico} dist
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p dist/js && rm -f dist/js/* && npm run eslint && terser assets/js/scripts.js -m -c -o dist/js/scripts.min.js
scripts.build:css: mkdir -p dist/css && rm -f dist/css/* && cleancss --skip-rebase assets/css/styles.css -o dist/css/styles.min.css
scripts.build:html: mkdir -p dist && cp assets/index.html dist && npm run build:fprints
scripts.build: npm run build:assets && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:html
scripts.watch:js: onchange 'assets/js/**/*.js' -- /bin/sh -c 'npm run build:js && npm run build:html'
scripts.watch:css: onchange 'assets/css/**/*.css' -- /bin/sh -c 'npm run build:css && npm run build:html'
scripts.watch: npm run watch:assets & npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:html
